channel.title: NPC Drops 317
channel.description:
How do i make it so an NPC Drops more than one item one item at a time?
Like instead of dropping one coin how do i make it drop several each time?

item.title: NPC Drops 317
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

i have a tut on a diff. forum
it uses the devolution way pm me if you want the link
the devo way
npcid npc item chance
doest drop random amount can
holds up to 15 drops for each npc
[one thing itll wont work for your item2.java drops anymore][all current item2 drops are erased]

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops 317
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“DavidDavidson, post:1, topic:349839”]How do i make it so an NPC Drops more than one item one item at a time?

Like instead of dropping one coin how do i make it drop several each time?[/quote]

well go to your server files, then go to npcdrops.cfg

npcdrop = 2265	526	1	100

npcdrop = 2265<this is the npc id	526<this is the item that you want dropped	1<this is the amount dropped at once. to change it just put the amount you want the npc to drop at one time when killed.100<this is the chance that it drops. it is 100% chance so it will drop all the item

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops 317
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

npcdrop = NPCID	ItemID	Amount	Rarity (out of 100 percent, so 100 would be always)

Read full topic
